transArray.content: This is the first time I have such a good impression of a hotel, especially the aunts who clean the room, I am so moved. I plan to stay in citigo when I go to Beijing in the future! Live in other cities too! ! The location of the hotel is also very good. Turn right when you go out and you will be the Phoenix Shopping Center. In the East Third Ring Road, it is convenient to go everywhere, and it is also close to the subway! !
